tool.name: Composite WW SS RR YY dinucleotide profiles
tool.help:
CALL sh dnp-compute-composite.sh compute-composite-input.tabular compute-composite-output.tabular
INPUT compute-composite-input.tabular - dinucleotide frequency profiles containing all 16 dinucleotides
OUTPUT compute-composite-output.tabular - original input with WW SS RR YY columns added to the output
DESCRIPTION Composite dinucleotides weak/weak WW (A or T) , strong/strong SS (G or C), purine/purine RR (A or G), and pyrimidine/pyrimidine YY (C or T) better reveal dinucleotode frequency patterns in nucleosome sequences. Given a tabular innput file with all 16 dinucleotides the composite patterns are computed as follows WW=AA+AT+TA+TT, SS=CC+CG+GC+GG, RR=AG+GA+AA+GG, YY=CC+TT+CT+TC and their columns added to the original table
Example columns of an input table pos AA AC AG AT ... -73 0.08616 0.08034 0.07146 0.05934 ... -72 0.11976 0.04966 0.03412 0.07274 ... -71 0.07202 0.08882 0.18912 0.0462 ... ... Example columns of computed composites ... WW SS RR ... 0.27644 0.1614 0.29494 ... 0.36788 0.1091 0.29428 ... 0.21406 0.12566 0.34432 ...
